name: Not Without You
description:
“Not Without You” is a diabolically clever mobile 2D puzzle brain-teaser, in which some adorable creatures - called “Pilcri” - have been kidnapped by a mad scientist, for experimentation! Your job is to help them escape, through the trap doors in each level. One caveat: all Pilcri move in unison, and must exit each level, together! Therefore, you must utilize the local environment to position them to successfully flee.

What better way to pass time than helping little creatures get back home! However, don't let the cuteness of the creatures (and environments) fool you... Each puzzle was designed by a mad scientist, after all. Not Without You is a fresh, modern take on classic puzzle mechanics. It is accessible to gamers of all ages, yet challenging enough for hardened problem-solvers.

Testing (more than a thousand players!) has shown that NWY is not only strong in gameplay, enjoyment and art, 94% of testers indicated that they’ll refer this game to their friends. While targeted at mobile users, it is still addictive on PCs and Macs.

KEY FEATURES:

+ Move Together: Control multiple Pilcri at once. When one moves, they all move - in the same direction.
+ So Many Puzzles: Tons of levels to entertain, tease and challenge your mind.
+ Beautiful Graphics in a Magical World: Hand crafted and ultra high-resolution 2D style.
+ Regular Updates: To keep the game fresh and fun!

NWY is one of many titles in the Burnout Game Ventures' pipeline, a portfolio of which is provided by Adventure Beard, LLC, a joint venture between Bad Pilcrow, Inc. (the IP holder), Major Games, Inc. (one of BGV’s Client Partners), and BGV. Burnout Game Ventures, where we incubate game companies from zero-to-sales in six months or less!
